More examplesFewer examplesThis TV series is intended for young people aged 13 to 18.The competition is open to anyone aged 18 or over.Simson, aged 19, was convicted on two charges of burglary.About 23% of men and women aged 25 to 34 said they had lived with a partner without getting married.If you are a healthy male aged between 35 and 40, you could take part in our medical research.
